hero.title: AI Engineer
hero.name: Minji Kang
hero.intro: AI engineer portfolio showcasing projects, skills, and ways of working.

about.title: About
about.desc:
I am a person who likes to learn new things and deeply explore the process of doing so.
Every day is new, and there are many opportunities to research and experiment.
This is interesting to me, so I started my career as an AI engineer.

When I solve problems, I start from 'what to make' rather than 'why this is a problem'.
I deconstruct the problem structure, explore possible solutions,
and build a system step by step, which gives me great meaning.

During my career, I participated in various AI product development from 0 to 1,
learning to design and implement functions, and selecting the most effective solution even in uncertain requirements.

I have worked in various areas such as system architecture, LLM engineering, backend development, automation, and more, and I want to continue to connect technology to solve real problems.
